name: Message in a Bottle (cpgeier, zdgeier, NMidkiff, tphelps93)
name_original: Message in a Bottle (cpgeier, zdgeier, NMidkiff, tphelps93)
description:
Ever wanted to throw out a random thought into the ocean?

Message in a Bottle is a multiplayer message game where players read and toss out each others messages. Feel free to play multiple times. Return to this page at the end of the jam to see the top messages.

Happy tossing!
